suggested_query: and the public construct of categories and hierarchies that guide the selection and organization of content. This dichotomy enables the editor to serve both as a personal workspace and a shared platform for collaboration and knowledge-sharing.
suggest_context: 3.1 OUTLINE - The text editor operates in a multi-modal manner, constantly both personal and general. - There are different layers of private and public: the private construct of choices and curation facilitates the projection on the common sense
